channel.title: Pages on companionway
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on companionway

item.title: About
item.description: I am a native of Northern Virginia, grew up there, and worked most of my life there. I had all advantages that come with the area including a good school system and a relatively resilient economy. After attending George Mason University and facing a recession, I maneuvered my way into the Fairfax County Fire Department. I had a wonderful 25 year career with the Fire Service and built strong friendships with many good people.

item.title: Projects
item.description: gomenu - [link to gomenu] This is a bash shell script that builds and allows editing of menus on the command-line newspaper-hugo-subtheme - [link to newspaper-hugo-subtheme] This project allows you to add a newspaper look and feel theme to an existing hugo website. myfiles: [discontinued] this is an older php project which allows html control of directories for file upload or download - not available publicly pyfiles: [link to pyfiles])https://github.
